Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires certain licensees to provide or make available drink drug testing devices
Summary: Requires certain licensees to provide or make available drink drug testing devices to protect consumers from drink spiking.
LawCode: Amd ยง100, ABC L; add ยง210-D, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law and the tax law, in relation to requiring certain licensees to provide drink drug testing devices to protect consumers from drink spiking
